footer.tagline: Student developers building the future. Where passion meets code.

hero.tagline: Student developers fueled by coffee, code, and curiosity. Building the future, one commit at a time.

services.title: Our Passion
services.subtitle: We are more than just coders. We are creators, learners, and friends exploring the digital frontier.

items.web_projects_desc: Building fun, experimental, and useful websites using modern frameworks like React and Vue.
items.mobile_experiments_desc: Tinkering with native and cross-platform mobile apps to learn and solve real-world problems.
items.open_source_desc: Contributing to and maintaining open source projects. We believe in sharing knowledge.
items.hackathons_desc: Participating in hackathons to challenge ourselves, meet new people, and build cool stuff fast.
items.creative_coding_desc: Exploring the intersection of art and code. Making things that look cool and inspire.
items.learning_together_desc: Sharing resources, hosting workshops, and growing together as a community of developers.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: We are a collective of student developers, dreamers, and geeks united by a passion for technology and a drive to learn.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To explore the possibilities of code without limits. We strive to learn, build, and share our knowledge with the community, creating a space where passion meets practice.
mission.quote: Code is our canvas, and we are just getting started. Let's build something awesome together.
mission.author: The GPS Team
